channel.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
channel.description:
well, Im just going to make a list of the bugs being discovered so far.
[ul][li]It is possible to smuggle items from world to world, agl managed to smuggle his inventory from world 2 to world 1 and vice versa[/li] [li]The end portal doesnt take you back to spawn[/li] [li]players who arent logged in can hurt you when not protected by a -pvp res or in the open, but you cant hurt them[/li] [li]Players can abuse the XP jars in creative, they can give themself a high level and then just transfer their level to another world[/li][/ul]
I will add onto this list for when i, or anyone else, discovers bugs.
As far as the inventory smuggling goes, it doesnt happen all the time, and could be a big problem if it works from creative to other worlds.
Agl also wants to know if its ok if he brings jungle saplings from world 1 to world 2.

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’ve updated craftbukkit to it’s latest dev (not recommended) version, and dynmap, xauth, and spout to their latest versions so we are fully updated right now.

Maybe it’ll be more stable? Couldn’t be less stable I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I do plan to do it fairly soon, but it sounds like a severe bug that needs an immediate temporary fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:439915”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=542604.msg3978529#msg3978529 date=1334958251]

I can fix that problem easily for now by not allowing not-logged-in people to walk.

edit: that problem is fixed.

why not just make it so they cant use portals?
[/quote]

That’s much harder to do. I can do it, but it takes re-working of the groups and a slight re-write of my auth script.[/quote]

I think thats what we should do isntead, because ive noticed we had alot more people try to join since they could walk around for a little before trying to login

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:

I can fix that problem easily for now by not allowing not-logged-in people to walk.

edit: that problem is fixed.
[/quote]

why not just make it so they cant use portals?[/quote]

That’s much harder to do. I can do it, but it takes re-working of the groups and a slight re-write of my auth script.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I still don’t buy it, even if you know them they’re still human. It’s human nature to want to better your self so I still think a lot of checking needs to occur after this is fixed. It won’t be that tedious of a task if executed correctly.

I also can’t login at all, at any point

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

I personally know nirvash, I told him and wrench_king to burn anything they smuggled and to stop smuggling. And they are doing so right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

They’ve probably smuggled items through, sohadura has had duped items in the past and Agl is just that type of guy

I can’t check chests, so that’s something Moparisthebest will have to cook up somehow.

Read full topic

@badger41 wrote:

hopefully other players dont realize this.

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

CoonHunter (Soharuda) was able to smuggle items out of creative into World 2. Not sure how he did it but apparently it was done accidentally

Edit: I managed to pull some information from CoonHunter and managed to replicate it. When you enter the game from creative or World 1 you are able to walk freely. If you walk from one world to the next without entering your forum password until you get there, your inventory will remain the same from where you had logged out previously.

OdBJa.png854×480

(The items were destroyed)

If admins/mitb are able to, check Soharuda/Agl1431’s chests for any items that may have come from creative.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

speed hacking isnt fixed, ive already banned uselessbastard2 for such.

unless it only patches speedhacking of great multitude

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

How does the inventory smuggling work? It seems to separate the inventories correctly for me, but then I wasn’t trying to cheat the system.

I’ll have a look at the end portal, but no plugins modify that, so maybe it has something to do with the changed map generation in 1.2.5?

I’ll put in a bug report to xAuth about that problem:
https://github.com/CypherX/xAuth/issues/128

@Tom, I thought speed-hacking was fixed by default? Is there a setting you know of that I can set?

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports [1.2.5]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Won’t work for me, keeps going down every 20 minutes or so, for me anyhow.

Stopped working just now again as soon as I installed a flymod to see if flying was disabled on this server, because according to the WM Nokturth is in house fly mode again.

Also, the portal back from the end somehow landed near his residence from what I picked up.

UPDATE - speed hacking still works, can’t you disable it in 1.2.5?

Read full topic

well, Im just going to make a list of the bugs being discovered so far.

[ul][li]It is possible to smuggle items from world to world, agl managed to smuggle his inventory from world 2 to world 1 and vice versa[/li]
[li]The end portal doesnt take you back to spawn[/li]

[li]Players can abuse the XP jars in creative, they can give themself a high level and then just transfer their level to another world[/li][/ul]

I will add onto this list for when i, or anyone else, discovers bugs.

As far as the inventory smuggling goes, it doesnt happen all the time, and could be a big problem if it works from creative to other worlds.
